trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers for <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider"></xref>.
These identifiers are used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent fields in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.HorizontallyScrollable"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.HorizontalScrollPercent"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.HorizontalViewSize"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
The value -1 can be substituted for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll> field.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"></xref> pattern.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.VerticallyScrollable"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.VerticalScrollPercent"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider.VerticalViewSize"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern>.
